𓋴𓂋𓃱

1) زُرنَا zurnā, “flute, zurna” and پَا pā, “leg” obsolete:
2) 𓈎𓄿𓅱𓀠 qairna 𓃀 ⇔ پَا pā, “leg” high-legs

𓈎𓄿𓅱𓀠 qairnat qvairu great grande giant ⇔
𓏘 cairn

E27 𓃱 GIR.affe S29: Γroß 𓋴𓂋 quer grow G+R=GIR 𓃱
